plot: A man's wife and his lover are brought together by a tragic car accident. While he lies in a deep coma in a hospital bed, the two women get to know each other and fight for the man's affection.
title: Por accidente
plot_es: A man's wife and his lover are brought together by a tragic car accident. While he lies in a deep coma in a hospital bed, the two women get to know each other and fight for the man's affection.
plot_en: A man's wife and his lover are brought together by a tragic car accident. While he lies in a deep coma in a hospital bed, the two women get to know each other and fight for the man's affection.
